context: By 2024, Bill Holdings Inc. has evolved into a comprehensive financial automation leader with annual revenue of $1.29B as of June 30, 2024. The company ranks 1st among 236 active competitors and is trusted by over 85 of the top 100 U.S. accounting firms, serving nearly half a million businesses. After acquiring Divvy ($2.5B in June 2021) for expense management and Invoice2go ($625M in September 2021) for AR capabilities, BILL now offers an integrated platform covering AP, AR, and spend management. The competitive landscape has intensified with new entrants like Ramp and Brex offering all-in-one financial operations platforms.
